channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] STAR Virtual Learning Platform (VLP) (starvlp)
item.description: Hands-on virtual labs accessible worldwide on any device at cloud scale, eliminating expensive lab environments and infrastructure

item.title: [updated] Data Virtualization (data-virtualization) was made available in the Dallas catalog
[updated] Data Virtualization (data-virtualization) was made available in the London catalog
[updated] Data Virtualization (data-virtualization) has a new plan named lite
item.description: One Data Virtualization instance with 1 head and 1 worker node. Head and worker nodes have 4 vCPU and 16 GB RAM per node. Lite instances automatically expire and are deleted after 30 days. Data Virtualization is available on IBM Cloud Pak for Data as a Service.
